Package com.flipfit.business

Class CustomerService

java.lang.Object
com.flipfit.business.CustomerService
All Implemented Interfaces:
customerInterface
public class CustomerService extends Object implements customerInterface
The CustomerService class provides the business logic for customer-related operations. It allows customers to view and manage their bookings, browse gym centers, and update their personal details.

    • bookSlot

      public void bookSlot(int customerId, int gymId, int slotId, LocalDate bookingDate) throws MissingValueException, MismatchinputException, DuplicateEntryException, AccessDeniedException
      Books a new slot for a customer at a specific gym center.
      Specified by:
      bookSlot in interface customerInterface
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer making the booking.
      gymId - The ID of the gym center where the slot is located.
      slotId - The ID of the slot being booked.
      bookingDate - The date for which the slot is being booked.
      Throws:
      MissingValueException
      MismatchinputException
      DuplicateEntryException
      AccessDeniedException
